title: They Are Coming Ao Shin

embed.description: Small patch went out on 8/27, including revert to Abyssal Scepter and a change to Gangplank's E. Rather than making a new post, I've just updated this one. Look for the **] The PBE has been updated! Today's update includes the PROJECT: Yi login screen, a mysterious " They are coming" mark & files, Master Yi's fast dance moves, and more!

body:
The "they are coming" symbol maybe related to ao shin it is hidden throughout the godyr comic and the symbol is seen on some fan related things for ao shin 

Thoughts?

Also this link
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ao_Shin

replies.body: But then again i just thought holy crap my english is bad "they" PLURAL ok this makes sense now

"They" isn't always used to refer to multiple individuals, it can be used to reference a single individual, so your English isn't that bad, you just got a little ahead of yourself. I think it's safe to say it's nothing to do with Ao Shin, the "Project" skins or Dha Ma is more than likely what this is referring to.

Captain here! There's still a lot of mystery around what the "they are coming" actually refers to. The most popular theory is that it refers to a new champion called Dha Ma. And for once there's actually some solid evidence to back this one up.

[This](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/8hhT41YP-champion-concept-dhama-the-force-of-balance) was posted a few months ago on the NA forums. It's a fan made champion concept idea for Dha Ma. If you look closely at [this](http://i.imgur.com/8uWLonQ.jpg) image, you can see the Ying Yang style emblem there, which is extremely similar to the one on PBE.

The final champ could be quite different to the original idea, as we saw with Gnar and Bard. But it's almost certainly a new champion, not Ao Shin, sorry :D

TL;DR
It's not Ao Shin, it a new champion called Dha Ma.
But ok that was definitely worth my time reading
dha ma.....rito plz stop with these ridiculous and 2-part names....DHA....MA......
This one makes sense this time though ahah, it's technically 2 champions.
ORRRR It might just be for the project skins. which are coming.
Argh srsly i did read about dha ma but i didnt really think it was going to be a champ due to problems with developing thing with the community etc

"His release has further been delayed to early 2016 because of kit, tech and theme difficulties regarding the champion."

Scroll down to second paragraph: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ao_Shin
